MRI Deface

mri_deface.Rd

This calls Freesurfer's mri_deface

mri_deface(file, brain_template = NULL, face_template = NULL, ...)

Arguments

file

File to pass to mri_deface
brain_template

gca brain template file to pass to mri_deface
face_template

gca face template file to pass to mri_deface
...

Additional arguments to pass to fs_cmd

Value

Result of fs_cmd, which type depends on arguments to ...

Note

If brain_template orface_template is NULL, they will be downloaded.

Examples

if (have_fs()){
   base_url = "https://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/pub/dist/mri_deface"
   url = file.path(base_url, "sample_T1_input.mgz")
   x = tempfile(fileext = ".mgz")
   utils::download.file(url, destfile = x)
   mri_deface(x)
}
#> . '/Applications/freesurfer/FreeSurferEnv.sh'; mri_deface "/private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpZDpJLA/file14af0206b9929.mgz"  /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpZDpJLA/file14af07814635f.gca /private/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T/RtmpZDpJLA/file14af0273ed6db.gca "/var/folders/1s/wrtqcpxn685_zk570bnx9_rr0000gr/T//RtmpZDpJLA/file14af07b387fdf.nii.gz";
#> NIfTI-1 format
